title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel, BPA-Free, 32oz, Dreamy Field
descriptions:
Introducing the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw, the perfect companion for sports and travel. With its sleek design and dreamy field color, this 32oz water bottle is not only stylish but also highly functional.

Crafted from durable stainless steel, this water bottle features double-wall insulation that keeps your beverages cold for up to 24 hours. Say goodbye to lukewarm drinks during your workouts or adventures!

The FreeSip spout is designed with convenience in mind. It comes with a built-in straw and a swig opening, allowing you to sip your favorite beverages effortlessly. The push-button lid is not only easy to use but also features a lock for added security. Plus, it is dishwasher safe, making cleaning a breeze.

Safety is a top priority with the Owala FreeSip Water Bottle. It is BPA-free and phthalate-free, ensuring that you can enjoy your drinks without any harmful chemicals.

This water bottle is not suitable for hot liquids, but it is perfect for any sports or travel activities. The wide opening allows for easy insertion of ice cubes, keeping your drinks icy cold even on the hottest days. The carry loop doubles as a lock, providing a convenient way to carry and secure your bottle on the go.

Choose from three available sizes - 24-Ounce, 32-Ounce, and 40-Ounce, to suit your needs. And with a limited lifetime warranty, you can trust in the durability and quality of the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw.

Stay hydrated in style with Owala!

The push-button lid is not only convenient but also comes with a lock feature for added security. You can trust that your drink will stay safely inside, even during bumpy rides or rigorous workouts.

Cleaning is a breeze with this water bottle. The bottle itself should be hand washed, while the lid is dishwasher-safe, making maintenance hassle-free.

Safety is a top priority, which is why this water bottle is BPA-free and phthalate-free. You can enjoy your favorite beverages without worrying about harmful chemicals.

Please note that this water bottle is not suitable for hot liquids. However, it excels at keeping your cold drinks refreshingly chilled.

Additional features include a wide opening, perfect for adding ice cubes, and a convenient carry loop that doubles as a lock. You can easily attach your water bottle to your backpack or gym bag, ensuring it's always within reach.

Choose from three different sizes - 24-Ounce, 32-Ounce, and 40-Ounce - to suit your hydration needs.

To give you peace of mind, this Owala water bottle comes with a limited lifetime warranty. We stand behind the quality and durability of our product.

Upgrade your hydration game with the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw. Stay hydrated in style during sports activities and travel adventures. Order yours today and experience the difference!
